text: Awala wakoposyedwe nsimangwao mwangali chilungamiko ni ikaweje ligongo lyanti wanganyao akutiji: “M’mbuje gwetu ni Allah.” Soni kungawaga Allah kwatuta wandu (amagongo) kupitila mwa wandu wane (mpela asilikali), gakagumulidwe masunagogi, yalichi, nyumba sine syakutendelamo ibada kwisa soni misikiti jalikolanjidwamo Lina lya Allah mwa winji, soni chisimu Allah chankamuchisye kusyene mundu jwaakunkamuchisya Jwalakwe (paajikamuchisya Dini Jakwe), chisimu Allah ni Jwakulimbangana nnope, Jwamachili gakupunda
